code: import{useEffect}from'react';const CheckAnswer=_ref=>{let{clickData,characterItem,setIsCorrect,showPopup,setShowPopup,correctCounter,setCorrectCounter}=_ref;useEffect(()=>{if(clickData&&!showPopup&&characterItem){const isCorrectAnswer=Array(characterItem.answer)?characterItem.answer.includes(clickData):clickData===characterItem.answer;if(isCorrectAnswer){console.log('正解！');setShowPopup(true);setIsCorrect(true);setCorrectCounter(prevCorrectCounter=>prevCorrectCounter+1);}else{console.log('残念！');setShowPopup(true);setIsCorrect(false);};}},[clickData]);return null;};export default CheckAnswer;
